headline: Clorox to Present at dbAccess Global Consumer Conference
summary: The Clorox Company (NYSE: CLX) today announced that Chair and Chief Executive Officer Linda Rendle and Chief Financial Officer Luc Bellet will participate in a fireside chat at the dbAccess Global Consumer Conference on Wednesday, June 4 in Paris.

headline: KINGSFORD AND MILLER LITE REPRISE LAST SUMMER'S SOLD-OUT BEERCOAL
summary: Kingsford®, the leader in charcoal grilling, and Miller Lite®, the Original Lite Beer, are heating summer up once again with the return of the highly anticipated Kingsford x Miller Lite Beercoal – that's right, charcoal briquets made with real beer. After selling out in record time on the Miller Lite Shop both in 2022 and 2023, Beercoal is back by popular demand and now available for the first time ever at retailers nationwide – but only for a limited time.

headline: Clorox mulls sourcing changes to offset $100M tariff hit
summary: The approach differs from its peer P&G, which is delaying supply chain changes until there is greater certainty.

headline: Household Products Stocks Q1 Results: Benchmarking Energizer (NYSE:ENR)
summary: Quarterly earnings results are a good time to check in on a company’s progress, especially compared to its peers in the same sector. Today we are looking at Energizer (NYSE:ENR) and the best and worst performers in the household products industry.
